string.value: |Strange indeed. It looks like some kind of a print. No wonder people are scared, who knows what Evil tainted this field. Maybe the scientists from Midgard can help.
BANDIT|Well, well! You’ve come to the wrong place, pal!
ALICE|You? What the ... I mean, thanks for saving me.
|Yes, I saved you and now you'll tell me who killed my father!
ALICE|I have nothing to do with it! It wasn't me!
I don't blame you.
ALICE|Why are you here then? It's so far from your home.
I ask questions here! Tell me, who attacked Glukhoe? You are the only witness.
ALICE|Yes... I was there... It was terrible...
|Who was it?!
ALICE|Crimson Dawn, the terrorists from the west. They would rarely leave their native land, but now they started to come out.
|How do you know?
ALICE|I travel a lot, I look for lost technologies and artifacts.
|I see. But why would they attack innocent people, like us?
ALICE|Something drives them out of their lairs. Their attacks have become more and more frequent lately. Many towns suffer from their raids.
|I will avenge. They will die! All of them!
ALICE|Don't be hasty. There's no need to kill everybody. The man you need is their leader - Axel.
ALICE|Destroy him and his evil empire will fall.
|You are right! Axel will pay!
ALICE|You must know that he is a dangerous man. It will be quite a challenge to get him.
|Don't worry about that. Just show me the way.
ALICE|There's only one way I’m aware of: the tunnel under the mountains. Ask somebody in Asgard, they will show it to you. Farewell, hero!
|Goodbye. Thanks for the help.
ARBITER|Let the battle begin!
ARBITER|Get ready to rumble!
|The victory is mine! As well as rare alloy!
You failed to protect the caravan.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
I don’t know the way, so I’ll better stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. I don’t want to go there.
